abt: AstitvA, meaning existence, sheds light and life to Indian heritage, and has been doing it for 13 years. The heritage collective of BMCC organises AstitvA every year, and since its inception, the event never fails to stand out with its uniqueness by celebrating culture in an innovative and authentic style.

Troika is the annual intercollegiate festival of Brihan MaharashtraCollege of Commerce. Every year students of the collegeorganize events of diverse categories for students of their collegeand others. Troika 2023 had 18 events across the Literature,Entertainment, Performing Arts, Fine Arts, Sports and Biz n Tech category.

BMCCâ€™s Cultural Department students throughout the year to excel in drama and dance competitions. They have done exceptional performances in events la Firodiya Karandak, Mood indigo, etc. They also organise events like Sarpotdar Karandak within the college.

The EMERGE event aims to provide a platform for the FY's to showcase their skills and talents through various events. The event aims to promote teamwork, creativity, and innovation among the participants.

A debate is not merely an exchange of arguments; it is an intellectual battleground where ideas clash and perspectives are scrutinized. In the realm of events, a debate takes on a unique significance, serving as a platform for participants to articulate their opinions, challenge assumptions, and engage in a structured discourse that can be both enlightening and entertaining.

The Champions Arena is more than a mere stage for competition; it is a symbolic battlefield where excellence and prowess converge. In this dynamic space, individuals, teams, or entities of exceptional merit come together to vie for supremacy in their respective fields.

A drawing workshop is a creative haven where the magic of visual expression comes to life. Within the confines of a studio or a vibrant communal space, participants gather to explore the nuances of artistic creation through pencils, charcoal, and ink.
A cloth donation event is a heartwarming endeavor that bridges the gap between abundance and need, embodying the spirit of generosity and compassion.

A seminar conducted by past students, guided by their accumulated wisdom and experiences, is a unique forum that pulsates with a blend of nostalgia and forward-looking insights. This event is a testament to the enduring connection between alumni and their alma mater.

Student entrepreneurship represents a dynamic intersection of youthful innovation, ambition, and business acumen. In an era where creativity and adaptability are prized, students are increasingly embracing the entrepreneurial spirit, seeking to turn their ideas into tangible ventures.

This unique gathering creates a space where the elders, enriched by a lifetime of experiences, share their insights, stories, and invaluable life lessons with the younger members of the community. It's a reciprocal exchange, where the exuberance of youth meets the steady wisdom of age.
The dance event is a vibrant convergence of rhythm, movement, and artistic expression, transforming any space into a lively celebration of the human spirit.
A singing event is a harmonious gathering that transcends boundaries, bringing together voices in a symphony of melodies.
